moduslam.data_manager.batch_factory.batch module

class moduslam.data_manager.batch_factory.batch.RawMeasurement(sensor: Sensor, values: Any)[source]

Bases: object

Raw sensor measurement.

Hash() calculation ignores values because some of them might not be hashable, i.e.PIL.Image.

sensor: Sensor
values: Any

class moduslam.data_manager.batch_factory.batch.DataBatch[source]

Bases: object

DataBatch is a container for data.

property data: deque[Element]

Elements in the data batch.

property empty: bool

Data batch emptiness status.

property first: Element

The first element of the batch.

property size_bytes: int

The size of the batch in bytes.

Not implemented.

add(new_element: Element) → None[source]

Adds new element to the Batch.

Parameters:

new_element – element to be added.

remove_first() → None[source]

Deletes the first(left) element of the batch.

remove_last() → None[source]

Deletes the last(right) element of the batch.

sort(reverse: bool = False) → None[source]

Sorts the data batch by timestamps.

Parameters:

reverse – if True, sorts in descending order.

clear() → None[source]

Deletes all elements of the batch.

moduslam.data_manager.batch_factory.factory module

class moduslam.data_manager.batch_factory.factory.BatchFactory(config: BatchFactoryConfig)[source]

Bases: object

Factory for creating and managing data batch.

__init__(config: BatchFactoryConfig) → None[source]
Parameters:

config – config with parameters for the Batch Factory.

property batch: DataBatch

A data batch sorted by timestamps.

fill_batch_sequentially() → None[source]

Adds elements with raw sensor measurements to the batch sequentially from the dataset.

Raises:

MemoryError – memory limit exceeded.

fill_batch_with_elements(elements: Sequence[Element]) → None[source]

Adds elements with raw sensor measurements to the batch for the given elements w/o raw measurements.

Parameters:

elements – sequence of elements w/o raw sensor measurements.

Raises:

MemoryError – memory limit exceeded.

fill_batch_by_request(request: PeriodicDataRequest) → None[source]

Adds elements with raw sensor measurements to the batch for the given request.

Parameters:

request – sequence of requests to create a Data Batch.

Raises:

  • UnfeasibleRequestError – can not fulfill the request.

  • MemoryError. –

_fulfill_request(reader: DataReader, request: PeriodicDataRequest) → list[Element] | None[source]

Gets requested elements.

Parameters:

request – a request with the sensor and margin timestamps .

Returns:

list of elements or None.

Raises:

MemoryError – memory limit exceeded.

_check_memory() → None[source]

Checks if the memory limit is exceeded.

Raises:

MemoryError – memory limit is exceeded.
